text:
If anyone wants to flex some javascript muscle and earn their way toward hacktoberfest swag: <https://github.com/williamspiro/HubSpot-Developer-Extension/issues/158>

Thanks to an article linked in <#CBA9UA4EN|javascript> it looks like our script for detecting if the HubSpot menu has loaded could be made more reliable and efficient by using a promise instead. In the issue page I linked to a How To article.

YASSSSS - Love Love Love that you're thinking international. There are SO many HubSpot CMS developers all over the world. Glad they can be more comfortable with their native language. Keep going!!! :slightly_smiling_face:
